data.actual_result: The icon is white in colour.
data.expected_result: It is in dark theme because the channel drawer and member list are still unthemed.
data.short_description: The voice connected icon on a server icon is white in light theme.
data.steps_to_repro: - Switch to light theme. - Join a VC. - Move out of the server you joined the VC in. - Observe the voice icon upon the server icon.
